Detailed Description

calculates Legendre polynomials

complex double clegendrep ( int  l,
complex double  x 
)

Definition at line 53 of file legendrep.c.

References SQR.

{
  switch (l) {
  case 0:
    return 1.0;
  case 1:
    return x;
  case 2:
    return (1.5*SQR(x)-0.5);
  case 3:
    return (2.5*SQR(x)-1.5)*x;
  case 4:
    return ((4.375*SQR(x)-3.75)*SQR(x)+0.375);
  default:
    fprintf(stderr, "legendrep.c: legendrep(l,x) not implemented for l>4\n");
    exit(-1);
  }
}

void clegendreps ( int  lmax,
complex double  x,
complex double *  lp 
)

Definition at line 74 of file legendrep.c.

References l.

{
  lp[0] = 1.0;
  if (lmax==0) return;
  
  lp[1] = x;
  for (int l=2; l<=lmax; l++) 
    lp[l] = ((2*l-1)*x*lp[l-1]-(l-1)*lp[l-2])/l;
}

double  x,
double *  lp 
)

Definition at line 42 of file legendrep.c.

References l.

{
  lp[0] = 1.0;
  if (lmax==0) return;
  
  lp[1] = x;
  for (int l=2; l<=lmax; l++) 
    lp[l] = ((2*l-1)*x*lp[l-1]-(l-1)*lp[l-2])/l;
}
